title: 4, 7, 8 and 14 of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further
4, 7, 8 and 14 of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further
heading: 3. Schedule 1 to the Student Support Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 77 of 2020)
text_raw:
3. Schedule 1 to the Student Support Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 77 of 2020) 
is amended in PART A thereof, by the insertion of the following approved 
institution: 

“Munster Technological University” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [600] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 
10 December, 2020. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 December, 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [600]

title: 4, 7, 8 and 14 of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations are an amendment to the existing principal Regulations (S.I. 
No. 77 of 2020) which prescribe "approved institutions" and other matters for 
the purposes of the Student Support Act 2011.These Regulations may be cited 
as the Student Support (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [600] 5
